entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maniwaki Airport 11:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -15.4°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
